svg.script: (function(){var actors={};actors.actor_1={node:document.getElementById("SVG-Circus-066433be-c9f7-18bb-9460-a3bcfc84e382").getElementById("actor_1"),type:"circle",cx:30,cy:50,dx:15,dy:31,opacity:1};actors.actor_2={node:document.getElementById("SVG-Circus-066433be-c9f7-18bb-9460-a3bcfc84e382").getElementById("actor_2"),type:"circle",cx:40,cy:55,dx:15,dy:31,opacity:1};actors.actor_3={node:document.getElementById("SVG-Circus-066433be-c9f7-18bb-9460-a3bcfc84e382").getElementById("actor_3"),type:"circle",cx:50,cy:50,dx:15,dy:31,opacity:1};actors.actor_4={node:document.getElementById("SVG-Circus-066433be-c9f7-18bb-9460-a3bcfc84e382").getElementById("actor_4"),type:"circle",cx:60,cy:55,dx:15,dy:31,opacity:1};actors.actor_5={node:document.getElementById("SVG-Circus-066433be-c9f7-18bb-9460-a3bcfc84e382").getElementById("actor_5"),type:"circle",cx:70,cy:50,dx:15,dy:31,opacity:1};var tricks={};tricks.trick_2=(function(_,a){a=(function(n){return n})(a)%1,a=a*1%1,a=0>a?1+a:a;var t,n;.25>a?(t=2*a*30*Math.cos(180*Math.PI/180),n=2*-a*30*Math.sin(180*Math.PI/180)):.75>a?(t=(.5-2*(a-.25))*30*Math.cos(180*Math.PI/180),n=-(.5-2*(a-.25))*30*Math.sin(180*Math.PI/180)):(t=(-.5+2*(a-.75))*30*Math.cos(180*Math.PI/180),n=-(-.5+2*(a-.75))*30*Math.sin(180*Math.PI/180)),_._tMatrix[4]+=t,_._tMatrix[5]+=n});tricks.trick_1=(function(_,t){t=(function(n){return n})(t)%1,t=0>t?1+t:t;var i;i=0.1>=t?1+(1.2-1)/0.1*t:t>=0.9?1.2-(t-0.9)*((1.2-1)/(1-0.9)):1.2;var a=_._tMatrix,r=-_.cx*i+_.cx,x=-_.cy*i+_.cy,c=a[0]*i,n=a[1]*i,M=a[2]*i,f=a[3]*i,g=a[0]*r+a[2]*x+a[4],m=a[1]*r+a[3]*x+a[5];_._tMatrix[0]=c,_._tMatrix[1]=n,_._tMatrix[2]=M,_._tMatrix[3]=f,_._tMatrix[4]=g,_._tMatrix[5]=m});var scenarios={};scenarios.scenario_2={actors: ["actor_1","actor_2","actor_3","actor_4","actor_5"],tricks: [{trick: "trick_2",start:0,end:1}],startAfter:0,duration:1000,actorDelay:0,repeat:0,repeatDelay:0};scenarios.scenario_1={actors: ["actor_1","actor_2","actor_3","actor_4","actor_5"],tricks: [{trick: "trick_1",start:0,end:1}],startAfter:0,duration:1400,actorDelay:100,repeat:0,repeatDelay:0};var _reqAnimFrame=window.requestAnimationFrame||window.mozRequestAnimationFrame||window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame||window.oRequestAnimationFrame,fnTick=function(t){var r,a,i,e,n,o,s,c,m,f,d,k,w;for(c in actors)actors[c]._tMatrix=[1,0,0,1,0,0];for(s in scenarios)for(o=scenarios[s],m=t-o.startAfter,r=0,a=o.actors.length;a>r;r++){if(i=actors[o.actors[r]],i&&i.node&&i._tMatrix)for(f=0,m>=0&&(d=o.duration+o.repeatDelay,o.repeat>0&&m>d*o.repeat&&(f=1),f+=m%d/o.duration),e=0,n=o.tricks.length;n>e;e++)k=o.tricks[e],w=(f-k.start)*(1/(k.end-k.start)),tricks[k.trick]&&tricks[k.trick](i,Math.max(0,Math.min(1,w)));m-=o.actorDelay}for(c in actors)i=actors[c],i&&i.node&&i._tMatrix&&i.node.setAttribute("transform","matrix("+i._tMatrix.join()+")");_reqAnimFrame(fnTick)};_reqAnimFrame(fnTick);})()
